message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below its value. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I understand your perspective, but $17,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $14,000, but that's as high as I can go.
